== Elavally (CT) (627805) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Elavally (CT) is a town in the [[Chavakkad]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 10.61 sq. km. and harbouring 3041 households with total population of 12819 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 30 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 327 km. Male population is 5969 and female population is 6850. Scheduled Caste population is 817 and Scheduled Tribes population is 16. Census Location Code of the town is 627805<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (Population 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 90 km. Railway station is at Guruvayoor at a distance of 7 km.
